# API Checker
Simple app for browsing api.

## Usage
```
pip install chkapi

chkapi [url]
```

You can check all features from scenarios: https://github.com/climbus/chkapi/tree/main/features

## From source
```
git clone https://github.com/climbus/chkapi.git
cd chkapi
poetry install
poetry shell
python -m rest_checker.app
```
